title: Simplify.
text: Simplify, resulting in $$16x^4-96x^3 y^1+16x^2 y^2-216x^1 y^3+81y^4$$.
speech: Simplify, resulting in  16 x to the fourth, minus, 96 x cubed y to the first plus, 16 x squared y squared minus, 216 x to the first y cubed plus 81 y to the fourth .
